properties.entry: SELECT b.BOARD_NO as BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_TITLE as BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT as BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_COUNT as BOARD_COUNT, b.BOARD_RECOMMEND as BOARD_RECOMMEND, b.USER_NO as USER_NO, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE,'MMDDHH24mi') BOARD_DATE, a.change_name as change_name, a.FILE_PATH as FILE_PATH FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT a on a.REF_NO = b.board_no WHERE b.BOARD_TYPE = ? AND b.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYYMMDDHH') AND STATUS = 'Y'
AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_COUNT desc , Board_RECOMMEND desc
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
